body.name: Mylldey Mens Casual Full Zip Cardigan Sweaters Cable Knit Jacket Sweater Men, US Size
features: Thick Knitted Sweaters and Lightweight, offers you warm and trendy styles. Warm zipper knit sweater for men, perfect as a Christmas gift, birthday gift, for yourself, your friend, your father or boyfriend
Full Size Zip - men's Long sleeve knit sweater cardigan has a great look and cool fit, not easy to pilling or deform. If you're tired of good sweaters,this cardigan sweater for men is what you need

Design - for this knitted cardigan sweater is crafted from high-quality fabrics with 2 side pockets and stretch-knit ribbed cuffs and hem. Offwhite, navy blue, and gray are available according to your preference.
Soft - stretchy fabric, breathable, good skin feeling, comfy to touch and wear, match perfectly with casual shirts and pants which gives it a very casual but upscale look

Sweater Size - please check our size chart (See Product Description) before purchasing to ensure correct sizing. If you can't confirm the size, please contact us. if you get the wrong size, we can offer you ★ free exchange or return

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mylldey Men's Cardigan Long Sleeve Slim Fit Knitted Sweater Features: Designed stylish, solid ribbed, cable knit pattern on full sweater. Premium quality fabric, expert craftsmanship, and durable stitching, provides a warm and comfortable wearing experience. Offered in a wide range of styles, colors, and sizes to meet the diverse demands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cardigan - can we get more colors?
reviews.reviewText: I've been wearing the dark gray for a couple of months now, it's my favorite cardigan. I just ordered the navy. I love the fit and the soft lining.Question for the company - Can you extend the line to some other colors? I wear a cardigan every day of the week during the winter (stay warm, meet dress code). I'd love to see a hunter green, purple or burgundy, and say a nice chocolate. I can't buy the white one - I'm such a klutz that I would spill on it in the first week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like the sweater its warm and like it looks good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, very soft
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice knitted full-zip sweater with a bomber jacket style design at the edges and openings. It's full polyester, but that doesn't compromise the comfort -- it's really soft. It's also stitched well, clean and tidy, and the material doesn't pill up or snag easily. The stag emblem stitched on the left chest is a really nice accent and the gold on my off-white colorway really pops. It fits well and doesn't box up around the waistline. I'm 6'0" 200lbs and the large size fits me well.If I had one critique it'd be the pockets. They aren't stitched into the inner lining, so if you're wearing the jacket open/unzipped, then sometimes you'll see the inner pocket fabric stick out of the jacket. It's not the best look.Overall though, this is a good sweater for cooler weather. Looks good, fits well, feels great. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality look
reviews.reviewText: The inside is a soft velvet material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater for the price. No complaints.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered size large (my usual size) and it fit me just fine. I like the fact that you can zip it up all the way, keeping you warm, without having any “lapels” that I find always get in my face with other zip-up sweaters. If you like to roll back the ribbed cuffs to expose a bit of your wrists, you can do that. (I usually do; makes it more convenient to check my wristwatch, which I do a lot.)Even though this is advertised as a men’s sweater, the pull tab of the zipper is on the left side. That doesn’t bother me—I’m all about warmth and functionality—but if you’re an extreme traditionalist, now you know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price, nice and soft
reviews.reviewText: This is nice and soft. It is not very thick and firm so I don’t expect it to last for many years but for the price and feel I think this is perfectly fine. The zipper is on the left side however but minor inconvenience. I am happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Amazon recommended the wrong size for me
reviews.reviewText: I followed Amazon's recommendations for fit ( large when I usually wear medium) and ended up ordering a size that's too big. What's up with Amazon's algorithms??? Clearly off. If its recommending the wrong size fit for customers.The sweater is a lovely colour and well made.I wish I had followed my mind and bought my size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mylldey Mens Casual Full Zip Cardigan Sweaters Cable Knit Jacket Sweater Men
reviews.reviewText: The item was as described, has great fit and very comfortable to wear. Keeps you nice and warm on the cold fall days. The sweater is lightweight and easy to pack too. Perfect for the casual evening on the town.
